source.name: Maruti Suzuki Driving School
source.attribution: Road signs and descriptions sourced from Maruti Suzuki Driving School's educational materials. Used for educational purposes only.

mandatory.name: Mandatory Signs
mandatory.description: These road signals and signs are used to make road users aware of specific laws and regulations that must be followed.

signs.name: No Entry
signs.description: This sign indicates that it is a no entry or restricted area ahead and no traffic is allowed.
signs.hover_text: No Entry: This sign indicates that it is a no entry or restricted area ahead and no traffic is allowed.

tooltip.title: No Entry
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that it is a no entry or restricted area ahead and no traffic is allowed.

signs.name: One Way
signs.description: The way beyond this sign restricts traffic entry.
signs.hover_text: One Way: The way beyond this sign restricts traffic entry.

tooltip.title: One Way
tooltip.description: The way beyond this sign restricts traffic entry.

signs.name: One Way
signs.description: This sign indicates that the oncoming traffic entry is restricted.
signs.hover_text: One Way: This sign indicates that the oncoming traffic entry is restricted.

tooltip.title: One Way
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that the oncoming traffic entry is restricted.

signs.name: Vehicles prohibited in both directions
signs.description: This sign indicates that traffic flow is not allowed in this area.
signs.hover_text: Vehicles prohibited in both directions: This sign indicates that traffic flow is not allowed in this area.

tooltip.title: Vehicles prohibited in both directions
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that traffic flow is not allowed in this area.

signs.name: All motor vehicles prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that no traffic movement is allowed in this area.
signs.hover_text: All motor vehicles prohibited: This sign indicates that no traffic movement is allowed in this area.

tooltip.title: All motor vehicles prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that no traffic movement is allowed in this area.

signs.name: Truck prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that the area is a no entry zone for truck and HMV (Heavy Motor Vehicles).
signs.hover_text: Truck prohibited: This sign indicates that the area is a no entry zone for truck and HMV (Heavy Motor Vehicles).

tooltip.title: Truck prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that the area is a no entry zone for truck and HMV (Heavy Motor Vehicles).

signs.name: Bullock & hand cart prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that entry of bullock carts and hand carts is not allowed.
signs.hover_text: Bullock & hand cart prohibited: This sign indicates that entry of bullock carts and hand carts is not allowed.

tooltip.title: Bullock & hand cart prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that entry of bullock carts and hand carts is not allowed.

signs.name: Bullock cart prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that entry of bullock carts is not allowed.
signs.hover_text: Bullock cart prohibited: This sign indicates that entry of bullock carts is not allowed.

tooltip.title: Bullock cart prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that entry of bullock carts is not allowed.

signs.name: Tongas prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that entry of tongas or horse carts is not allowed.
signs.hover_text: Tongas prohibited: This sign indicates that entry of tongas or horse carts is not allowed.

tooltip.title: Tongas prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that entry of tongas or horse carts is not allowed.

signs.name: Hand cart prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that entry of hand carts is not allowed.
signs.hover_text: Hand cart prohibited: This sign indicates that entry of hand carts is not allowed.

tooltip.title: Hand cart prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that entry of hand carts is not allowed.

signs.name: Cycle prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that entry of cycles is not allowed.
signs.hover_text: Cycle prohibited: This sign indicates that entry of cycles is not allowed.

tooltip.title: Cycle prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that entry of cycles is not allowed.

signs.name: Pedestrians prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that movement of pedestrians is not allowed.
signs.hover_text: Pedestrians prohibited: This sign indicates that movement of pedestrians is not allowed.

tooltip.title: Pedestrians prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that movement of pedestrians is not allowed.

signs.name: Right turn prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that traffic is not allowed to turn right.
signs.hover_text: Right turn prohibited: This sign indicates that traffic is not allowed to turn right.

tooltip.title: Right turn prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that traffic is not allowed to turn right.

signs.name: Left turn prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that traffic is not allowed to turn left.
signs.hover_text: Left turn prohibited: This sign indicates that traffic is not allowed to turn left.

tooltip.title: Left turn prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that traffic is not allowed to turn left.

signs.name: U-turn prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that traffic is not allowed to take a U-turn at this juncture.
signs.hover_text: U-turn prohibited: This sign indicates that traffic is not allowed to take a U-turn at this juncture.

tooltip.title: U-turn prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that traffic is not allowed to take a U-turn at this juncture.

signs.name: Overtaking prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that overtaking or going past another vehicle is not allowed at this point.
signs.hover_text: Overtaking prohibited: This sign indicates that overtaking or going past another vehicle is not allowed at this point.

tooltip.title: Overtaking prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that overtaking or going past another vehicle is not allowed at this point.

signs.name: Horn prohibited
signs.description: This sign indicates that it is a silence zone and honking or using horns is strictly not allowed in this area.
signs.hover_text: Horn prohibited: This sign indicates that it is a silence zone and honking or using horns is strictly not allowed in this area.

tooltip.title: Horn prohibited
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that it is a silence zone and honking or using horns is strictly not allowed in this area.

signs.name: No parking
signs.description: This sign indicates that parking of vehicles is not allowed in this area and that, the vehicles would be towed away if found parked here.
signs.hover_text: No parking: This sign indicates that parking of vehicles is not allowed in this area and that, the vehicles would be towed away if found parked here.

tooltip.title: No parking
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that parking of vehicles is not allowed in this area and that, the vehicles would be towed away if found parked here.

signs.name: Speed limit
signs.description: This sign designates the speed of traffic on road, as specified in the sign.
signs.hover_text: Speed limit: This sign designates the speed of traffic on road, as specified in the sign.

tooltip.title: Speed limit
tooltip.description: This sign designates the speed of traffic on road, as specified in the sign.

signs.name: No stopping or standing
signs.description: This sign indicates that in order to have an obstruction free flow of traffic, no vehicle is allowed to stop or wait in this area.
signs.hover_text: No stopping or standing: This sign indicates that in order to have an obstruction free flow of traffic, no vehicle is allowed to stop or wait in this area.

tooltip.title: No stopping or standing
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that in order to have an obstruction free flow of traffic, no vehicle is allowed to stop or wait in this area.

signs.name: Load limit
signs.description: This road sign limits the load of the vehicle, which should ply on the road further.
signs.hover_text: Load limit: This road sign limits the load of the vehicle, which should ply on the road further.

tooltip.title: Load limit
tooltip.description: This road sign limits the load of the vehicle, which should ply on the road further.

signs.name: Restriction end sign
signs.description: This sign indicates that restrictions imposed by the earlier signs end here and are not meant to be followed from this point on.
signs.hover_text: Restriction end sign: This sign indicates that restrictions imposed by the earlier signs end here and are not meant to be followed from this point on.

tooltip.title: Restriction end sign
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that restrictions imposed by the earlier signs end here and are not meant to be followed from this point on.

signs.name: Compulsory left turn
signs.description: This sign indicates that the driver has to take a compulsory left turn due to some diversion etc.
signs.hover_text: Compulsory left turn: This sign indicates that the driver has to take a compulsory left turn due to some diversion etc.

tooltip.title: Compulsory left turn
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that the driver has to take a compulsory left turn due to some diversion etc.

signs.name: Compulsory turn right ahead
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a compulsory right turn ahead and that the driver has to obey it.
signs.hover_text: Compulsory turn right ahead: This sign indicates that there is a compulsory right turn ahead and that the driver has to obey it.

tooltip.title: Compulsory turn right ahead
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that there is a compulsory right turn ahead and that the driver has to obey it.

signs.name: Compulsory ahead only
signs.description: This sign indicates that the traffic has to move straight ahead without turning either left or right.
signs.hover_text: Compulsory ahead only: This sign indicates that the traffic has to move straight ahead without turning either left or right.

tooltip.title: Compulsory ahead only
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that the traffic has to move straight ahead without turning either left or right.

signs.name: Compulsory ahead or turn right
signs.description: This sign indicates that the traffic should either move straight or take a right turn.
signs.hover_text: Compulsory ahead or turn right: This sign indicates that the traffic should either move straight or take a right turn.

tooltip.title: Compulsory ahead or turn right
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that the traffic should either move straight or take a right turn.

signs.name: Compulsory ahead or turn left
signs.description: This sign indicates that the traffic should either move straight or take a left turn.
signs.hover_text: Compulsory ahead or turn left: This sign indicates that the traffic should either move straight or take a left turn.

tooltip.title: Compulsory ahead or turn left
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that the traffic should either move straight or take a left turn.

signs.name: Compulsory keep left
signs.description: This sign indicates that the driver should drive in a left lane.
signs.hover_text: Compulsory keep left: This sign indicates that the driver should drive in a left lane.

tooltip.title: Compulsory keep left
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that the driver should drive in a left lane.

signs.name: Compulsory cycle track
signs.description: This sign indicates that this lane is meant for cycles only.
signs.hover_text: Compulsory cycle track: This sign indicates that this lane is meant for cycles only.

tooltip.title: Compulsory cycle track
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that this lane is meant for cycles only.

signs.name: Compulsory sound horn
signs.description: This sign indicates that it is compulsory to blow horn at this point.
signs.hover_text: Compulsory sound horn: This sign indicates that it is compulsory to blow horn at this point.

tooltip.title: Compulsory sound horn
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that it is compulsory to blow horn at this point.

signs.name: Stop
signs.description: This sign indicates that the driver has to stop or halt here.
signs.hover_text: Stop: This sign indicates that the driver has to stop or halt here.

tooltip.title: Stop
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that the driver has to stop or halt here.

signs.name: Give Way
signs.description: This sign directs the traffic to give way to the traffic on your right side.
signs.hover_text: Give Way: This sign directs the traffic to give way to the traffic on your right side.

tooltip.title: Give Way
tooltip.description: This sign directs the traffic to give way to the traffic on your right side.

cautionary.name: Cautionary Signs
cautionary.description: These signs are used to warn road users of potential hazards or dangerous conditions ahead.

signs.name: Right hand curve
signs.description: This sign cautions you about a right hand curve on the road ahead.
signs.hover_text: Right hand curve: This sign cautions you about a right hand curve on the road ahead.

tooltip.title: Right hand curve
tooltip.description: This sign cautions you about a right hand curve on the road ahead.

signs.name: Left Hand Curve
signs.description: This sign cautions you about a left hand curve on the road ahead.
signs.hover_text: Left Hand Curve: This sign cautions you about a left hand curve on the road ahead.

tooltip.title: Left Hand Curve
tooltip.description: This sign cautions you about a left hand curve on the road ahead.

signs.name: Right Hair Pin Bend
signs.description: This sign cautions you about a sharp right turn on the road ahead.
signs.hover_text: Right Hair Pin Bend: This sign cautions you about a sharp right turn on the road ahead.

tooltip.title: Right Hair Pin Bend
tooltip.description: This sign cautions you about a sharp right turn on the road ahead.

signs.name: Left Hair Pin Bend
signs.description: This sign cautions you about a sharp left turn on the road ahead.
signs.hover_text: Left Hair Pin Bend: This sign cautions you about a sharp left turn on the road ahead.

tooltip.title: Left Hair Pin Bend
tooltip.description: This sign cautions you about a sharp left turn on the road ahead.

signs.name: Right Reverse Bend
signs.description: This sign cautions the driver about the zigzag turn towrds right.
signs.hover_text: Right Reverse Bend: This sign cautions the driver about the zigzag turn towrds right.

tooltip.title: Right Reverse Bend
tooltip.description: This sign cautions the driver about the zigzag turn towrds right.

signs.name: Left Reverse Bend
signs.description: This sign cautions the driver about the zigzag turn towrds left.
signs.hover_text: Left Reverse Bend: This sign cautions the driver about the zigzag turn towrds left.

tooltip.title: Left Reverse Bend
tooltip.description: This sign cautions the driver about the zigzag turn towrds left.

signs.name: Steep ascent
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a steep ascent ahead.
signs.hover_text: Steep ascent: This sign indicates that there is a steep ascent ahead.

tooltip.title: Steep ascent
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that there is a steep ascent ahead.

signs.name: Steep descent
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a steep descent ahead.
signs.hover_text: Steep descent: This sign indicates that there is a steep descent ahead.

tooltip.title: Steep descent
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that there is a steep descent ahead.

signs.description: This sign cautions the driver to be careful as the road ahead is going to be narrow.
signs.hover_text: Narrow road ahead: This sign cautions the driver to be careful as the road ahead is going to be narrow.

tooltip.title: Narrow road ahead
tooltip.description: This sign cautions the driver to be careful as the road ahead is going to be narrow.

signs.description: This sign indicates that the road ahead widens, hence the driver should adjust accordingly.

tooltip.title: Road widens ahead
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that the road ahead widens, hence the driver should adjust accordingly.

signs.description: This sign indicates that the road ahead converges to a bridge which is of less width than the road.
signs.hover_text: Narrow bridge: This sign indicates that the road ahead converges to a bridge which is of less width than the road.

tooltip.title: Narrow bridge
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that the road ahead converges to a bridge which is of less width than the road.

signs.description: This sign indicates the slippery condition of the road ahead.

tooltip.description: This sign indicates the slippery condition of the road ahead.

signs.hover_text: Cycle crossing: This sign indicates that there is a cycle path intersecting ahead.

tooltip.description: This sign indicates that there is a cycle path intersecting ahead.

signs.name: Pedestrian crossing
signs.description: This sign indicates that there is a pedestrian crossing ahead. These are also called zebra crossing.

tooltip.title: Pedestrian crossing
tooltip.description: This sign indicates that there is a pedestrian crossing ahead. These are also called zebra crossing.

tooltip.description: This sign indicates that there is a school ahead/nearby.

signs.hover_text: Flood Gauge: This sign is erected on highways/roads near river, canal, lake etc. This sign indicates the level of water. It also cautions the danger level of the water.

tooltip.title: Flood Gauge
tooltip.description: This sign is erected on highways/roads near river, canal, lake etc. This sign indicates the level of water. It also cautions the danger level of the water.

signs.name: Destination Sign
signs.description: This sign indicates the direction and distance to various destinations falling on that particular road. These signs are generally installed before intersections.

signs.name: Direction Sign
signs.description: This sign shows the direction and distance of the destination/place written on it.
